0.0.01.name: wordpress/mingle-aweber-signup
0.0.01.description:
Enables you to optionally push users to your AWeber email list when they signup through mingle... This plugin requires you to also be running Mingle.

See Mingle In Action!

If you're wondering what Mingle is -- it is another WordPress plugin that easily turns your wordpress blog into a social network. You can now try Mingle out in our Mingle Community! Come be my friend at:

Mingle WordPress Community
